title: Warlock
description: We start off seeing warlock as an owl who is being perused by the psi-cops, a telekinetic group out to destroy all transmode beings. He lands in a cemetery and at the grave of his "self-friend", Doug Ramsey, he sinks down to see if there are any remains of the transmode virus. Finds a girl that can alter things into techno-organisms, they are attacked and manage to escape!Collects Warlock (1999) #s 1-9
author: Louise Simonson
